queries.name: ASREPRoasting
queries.query: MATCH (n:User {dontreqpreauth: true}) WHERE n.enabled=true RETURN n.name as Username, n.displayname as DisplayName, n.description as Description, n.title as Title, n.pwdneverexpires as PasswordNeverExpires, n.passwordnotreqd as PasswordNotRequired, n.sensitive as Sensitive, n.admincount as AdminCount, n.serviceprincipalnames as SPNs
